sn2.20:1: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto bhagavato santike imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn2.20:3: Kammaṁ vijjā ca dhammo ca,sīlaṁ jīvitamuttamaṁ;Etena maccā sujjhanti,na gottena dhanena vā.
sn2.20:4: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso,sampassaṁ atthamattano;Yoniso vicine dhammaṁ,evaṁ tattha visujjhati.
sn2.20:5: Sāriputtova paññāya,sīlena upasamena ca;Yopi pāraṅgato bhikkhu,etāvaparamo siyā"ti.
sn2.20:6: Idamavoca anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto. Idaṁ vatvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
sn2.20:7: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi: "imaṁ, bhikkhave, rattiṁ aññataro devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho, bhikkhave, so devaputto mama santike imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn2.20:9: Kammaṁ vijjā ca dhammo ca,sīlaṁ jīvitamuttamaṁ;Etena maccā sujjhanti,na gottena dhanena vā.
sn2.20:10: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso,sampassaṁ atthamattano;Yoniso vicine dhammaṁ,evaṁ tattha visujjhati.
sn2.20:11: Sāriputtova paññāya,sīlena upasamena ca;Yopi pāraṅgato bhikkhu,etāvaparamo siyā’ti.
sn2.20:12: Idamavoca, bhikkhave, so devaputto. Idaṁ vatvā maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī"ti.
sn2.20:13: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca: "so hi nūna, bhante, anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto bhavissati. Anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati āyasmante sāriputte abhippasanno ahosī"ti.
sn2.20:14: Candimaso ca veṇḍu ca,Dīghalaṭṭhi ca nandano;Candano vāsudatto ca,Subrahmā kakudhena ca;Uttaro navamo vutto,Dasamo anāthapiṇḍikoti.
